(IsInsulated ? 3 : 2) : Diameter_mm <= 25 ? (IsInsulated ? 3.5 : 2) : Diameter_mm <= 32 ? (IsInsulated ? 4 : 2.5) : Diameter_mm <= 40 ? (IsInsulated ? 4.5 : 3) : Diameter_mm <= 50 ? config_009.NAME: Клей для монтажа изоляции Energoflex Extra банка - объем 0,8л
config_009.CREATOR: Энергофлекс
config_009.VALUE_FORMULA:
(
  InsulationThikness_mm > 25
    ? (Area_m2 / 5.0)
    : (Length_m / (
        InsulationThikness_mm <= 6  ? 300.0 :
        InsulationThikness_mm <= 9  ? 200.0 :
        InsulationThikness_mm <= 13 ? 140.0 :
        InsulationThikness_mm <= 20 ? 90.0  :
        InsulationThikness_mm <= 25 ? 50.0  :
        50.0
      ))
) / 0.8
